page.title: 06Trent Valley Power Stations.
page.content: The{Trent Valley}is a very flat area to the west of Gainsborough.My neighbour works at West Burton power Station which is a thermal power station built on the west bank of the Trent. Although the power station is very large;there are four generators and eight cooling towers,he is one of six men who work in the control room.From this room they control all the working of the station.The power station uses {coal}from the{Nottinghamshire} coalfield and water from the River Trent.The coal that is burnt in the boilers is crushed as fine as talcum powder before it is ignited. There is a social club and a sports club at the station.Table tennis is a very popular sport at the club and the power station has three teams in the Gainsborough and District league.
